China:
Renzong died.
Emperor Yingzong of Song became emperor of the Song dynasty.
The Pizhi Pagoda was completed.
Spain: Synod of Jaca (1063): Ramiro I presided over a synod in Jaca which reestablished the Roman Catholic Diocese of Huesca. Battle of Graus: Ramiro I died in a failed attempt to take Graus from the taifa of Zaragoza. He was succeeded by his son Sancho Ram√≠rez.
